attributes.action: Continue to allow the Armed Forces to Recruit in Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Armed forces should continue to be permitted to present the Military as a career in schools.Those that are trying to stop this are making it look as if its a bad thing to serve your country and defend it against all and any aggressors.There are those of us who find it deeply offensive and downright unpatriotic to take such a negative stance.Our Servicemen and Women do an outstanding job and on demob become outstanding citizens with a much broader outlook on life than the average citizen.
